subject: Steroids
lead_paragraph: Henry A. Waxman criticized Rusty Hardin for remarks he made denouncing plans by Jeff Novitzky, the federal agent leading steroids investigations, to attend the House committee hearing Wednesday.
snippet: Henry A. Waxman criticized Rusty Hardin for remarks he made denouncing plans by Jeff Novitzky, the federal agent leading steroids investigations, to attend the House committee hearing Wednesday.
